description: Updates the firewall domain list from an array of domain specifications.

parameters.name: FirewallDomainListId
parameters.description: The ID of the domain list whose domains you want to update.

parameters.name: Operation
parameters.description: What you want DNS Firewall to do with the domains that you are providing: ADD - Add the domains to the ones that are already in the domain list. REMOVE - Search the domain list for the domains and remove them from the list. REPLACE - Update the domain list to exactly match the list that you are providing.

parameters.name: Domains
parameters.description: A list of domains to use in the update operation. Each domain specification in your domain list must satisfy the following requirements: It can optionally start with * (asterisk). With the exception of the optional starting asterisk, it must only contain the following characters: A-Z, a-z, 0-9, - (hyphen). It must be from 1-255 characters in length. (string) ---

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The ID of the firewall domain list that DNS Firewall just updated.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the domain list.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: Additional information about the status of the list, if available.
